description: Video review ends with an outcome on the last play standing or being overturned.
title: instant_replay_end

ActionScoreDelta.description: Shows the change to the score caused by the action. See `Score` for the current score of the game.
ActionScoreDelta.title: Action Score Delta

ActionPlayerStatsDelta.description: Shows the change to player statistics caused by the action. See `PlayerStats` for the current player statistics of the game.
ActionPlayerStatsDelta.title: Action Score Delta

Confirmed.description: Action confirmation status. This indicates an action that actually happened, as opposed to _possible_ actions, however the final confirmation is still pending and will be sent with the same action ID, and potentially more information related to the action. An unconfirmed event is closer in time to the event happening, as confirmation could be delayed by events on field. Take this in account when handling the events
Confirmed.title: Confirmed

Participant.description: Team that triggered the challenge. Can be 0, which indicates automatic (neutral) review.
Participant.title: Participant

FollowsAction.description: Action ID of a previous action that originated this action. It is used to indicate actions that may need to be discarded as a unit
FollowsAction.title: Follows Action

Parti1State.description: State for the `Participant1`. Home/away mapping is provided by the `Participant1IsHome` flag on the fixture
Parti1State.title: Participant 1 State

Parti2State.description: State for the `Participant2`. Home/away mapping is provided by the `Participant1IsHome` flag on the fixture
Parti2State.title: Participant 2 State

PossibleChallenge.description: Set to true if there is a possible challenge (instant replay), either by a team or a neutral one.
PossibleChallenge.title: Possible Challenge

Score.description: Score information, referencing the current score of the game, not the change caused by this action. Score is provided in actions that can modify the score-line
Score.title: Score
